title: Analysis of factors influencing the occurrence of diabetes insipidus following neuroendoscopic transsphenoidal resection of pituitary adenomas and risk assessment
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Xiao-Jian Li, Zheng Peng, Yun-Feng Wang, Jie Wang, Hui-Ying Yan, Wei Jin, Zong Zhuang, Chun-Hua Hang, Wei Li
